Reliance Retail.title: Software Engineer
data: Worked on building a India’s largest ecommerce marketplace web application.
Created our own custom e-commerce theme web app by using one of the existing theme web apps provided by a platform in one of the subsidiary e-commerce company.

Ninjacart.title: Software Engineer
data: Built several responsive web apps, specifically, mobile view web apps, and integrated them with the mobile SDKs which will make the web apps behave like android applications.
Educated and conducted multiple hands-on workshops for many new employees regarding Core Javascript, Angular, and ReactJs.

Single-handedly developed UI for a microservice where HRs, PMs, and CEOs can communicate with multiple roles of employees, some of its main features like creating/editing notifications and mapping users to those notifications, providing training tasks for different titles of workers to understand the company and how it works.
Introduced a Live tracking feature in the already existing AppManagement UI, where we can track the live moment of the people.
Functioned as a UI developer on newly started B2C flows where will be supplying the vegetables, groceries directly to the customers home instead of CC’s, FC’s, MDC’s, MMDC’s.
Served as a Backend developer on one of the features in AppManagement microservice where we can move the mapped users between different app versions.
Configured on many frontend modules and also learned many web optimization techniques.

Class bridge.title: Front End Engineer
data: Class Bridge was a 3 people engineering team and has engineered Online Institution Management Portal.
Performed as an only Frontend developer where I developed many UI-rich modules that helped students, teachers, and Institute managers across many schools and colleges.
Some of its main features like creating institutes, classes and sections, teachers, students, exams, scheduling exams, timetables, live chat, and conducting online classes.

Ninjacart-Intern.title: Software Developer Intern
data: Solely developed UI for a microservice for managing different builds(versions) of mobile applications in people's mobile phones across different cities, facilities, and store levels.
These are some of its main features like releasing the apps, mapping users across different facilities, downloading the apps, checking the user-app-related details.

Virtusa.title: Software Developer Intern
data: Converted one of the old bank-related user interfaces into a new rich user interface using Angular and worked on writing APIs in that bank-related module using spring boot.

Legal Education Awareness Foundation.title: Software Developer Intern
data: Worked as a Remote Intern on the frontend side of the responsive websites.
Involved in creating a consultancy and olympiad website for conducting olympiad exams for the students and both sites are hosted in Godaddy.

projects.title: Class bridge
projects.description: It's an Online Institution Management Portal. Some of its main features like creating institutes, classes and sections, teachers, students, exams, scheduling exams, timetables, live chat, and conducting online classes.

projects.title: Splitter
projects.description: Built a website where splitting of expenses among groups of individuals can be done in an easier fashion.

projects.title: Website for Google Developer Student Club @ SASTRA (DSC)
projects.description: Built a website for the Developer student club (DSC) of my university.

projects.title: Exam Automata
projects.description: Built a website where anyone can host and conduct exams online and it’s still currently being used by some of the colleges in India like SASTRA, LPU, etc.

projects.title: Gamestore
projects.description: Built a website where customers buy and sell video games.
